price: Even if they endure patiently, the Fire will still be their abode; and if they seek to make amends, they will not be allowed to do so.
arabic: فَإِن يَصۡبِرُواْ فَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡۖ وَإِن يَسۡتَعۡتِبُواْ فَمَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُعۡتَبِينَ
